refnamediv.refpurpose: Generates a secure Public-Key Cryptography Standards (PKCS#12) file from a PEM (base64 encoded DER) file comprised of an X.509 certificate and an associated Private Key.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Generates a secure Public-Key Cryptography Standards (PKCS#12) file from a PEM (base64 encoded DER) file comprised of an X.509 certificate and an associated Private Key.

refsect2.title: key_name
refsect2.para: Name that identifies private key associated with X.509 certificate.

refsect2.title: name
refsect2.para: Name to used to identify each pkcs#12 object bundle.

refsect2.title: pass
refsect2.para: A password or pass phrase used to encrypt the pkcs#12 file

refsect2.title: export_chain
refsect2.para: 1/0 - to export the certificate chain if there is a such

refsect2.title: additional_certs
refsect2.para: Certificates in PEM format to be added to the bundle even if they are not in the certificate chain stored in the memory object of the certificate

example.title: Persisting a key & certificate
example.para: The example below persists a key named 'id_rsa' and certificate created for it into user's key space. Thus after server restart the key will be available again.
